images.prompt: Create a full scientific poster titled 'SentinelKilnDB: A Large-Scale Benchmark for Brick Kiln Detection From Satellite Imagery'. Overall style: NeurIPS-style clean vector infographic with strong hierarchy, thin lines, blue-magenta palette, large heading, clear section boxes, icons, maps, and satellite textures. Aspect ratio 16:9 or A0 poster. Avoid clutter; use modern ML-diagram aesthetics.

Create a full scientific poster titled 'JoulesEye: Energy Expenditure and Respiration Sensing from Thermal Imagery While Exercising'. Layout: a clean conference-style A1 poster with sections: Overview, Method, Sensing Pipeline, Modeling, Results, Key Findings.
Create an infographic explaining brick kiln detection: Sentinel-2 RGB bands → preprocessing → deep model → oriented bounding boxes → compliance map. Use earthy palette and real satellite textures.

Design a split-panel infographic. Left side: 'Traditional Physics-Based Model (WRF–CAMx)' with visuals of differential equations, 3D atmosphere grid, CPU clusters, slow runtime indicators. Right side: 'Neural Emulator' with a neural network diagram, GPUs, fast inference, real-time forecasting. Include inputs: emissions, meteorology, topography, and outputs: PM2.5 concentration maps. Use bold colors and clean icons.
Generate an infographic explaining differences between natural RGB imagery; thermal imagery; and charts; esp. from perspective of say VLMs
Generate an infographic of PM2.5 continuous monitoring stations in India
